title: Panther Hollow, Pittsburgh
credit_line: Purchase: gift of Mr. and Mrs. James F. Hillman
provenance_text:
Valeltine Gallery, New York, NY, c. 1934 until at least April 1936 (Carnegie exhibition); Mr. and Mrs. Lee A. Ault, New York, NY, by 1948 (sale, Parke Bernet Galleries, New York, Oct. 9, 1963); Museum purchase: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. James F. Hillman, December 1963.
 
Accessioned on December 17, 1963.

Updated and under review by CGK.

creator.birth_place: West Calder (West Lothian, Scotland, United Kingdom)
